turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Aerobie.
turn.1: What other products did they come up with?
turn.2: Since then, Adler and the company have produced 12 other sport toy products.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: The Aerobie allows for throws over unusually long distances.
turn.5: What are some of the distances?
turn.6: It flies faster and farther than a common flying disc.
turn.7: Can you tell me more about the speed and distance capabilities?
turn.8: When well tuned, it can fly in a straight line, "like a puck on an invisible sheet of ice".
turn.9: Is there any other interesting aspects?
turn.10: It does not have the tendency to roll when thrown level, as a flying disc does.
turn.11: What do you do to make it not roll?
turn.12: But similarly to a disc, an Aerobie can be thrown in a curved path by throwing it in a slant.
